borderRadius.description: Defines the border radius of the bar element.

onItemClick.description: Callback fired when a bar item is clicked.

event.name: event
event.description: The event source of the callback.

renderer.description: The type of renderer to use for the bar plot. - svg-single: Renders every bar in a <rect /> element. - svg-batch: Batch renders bars in <path /> elements for better performance with large datasets, at the cost of some limitations. Read more: https://mui.com/x/react-charts/bars/#performance

slotProps.description: The props used for each component slot.

slotDescriptions.bar: The component that renders the bar.
slotDescriptions.barLabel: The component that renders the bar label.
